title: Looking to Buy: Cy Young T206 "Bare Hand" Graded SGC

posts.post_title: Looking to Buy: Cy Young T206 "Bare Hand" Graded SGC
posts.post_content:
Let me know what you have and how much you are looking for on it. I would like scans of the front and back if at all possible. I will consider any grade from Authentic and up. Thanks

-Chris

like this one and the handful like it that end on ebay every week?
